scripts.db:create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name better-auth-dynamodb --template-body file://dynamodb-cloudformation.json --region us-east-1
scripts.db:wait: aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name better-auth-dynamodb --region us-east-1
scripts.db:update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name better-auth-dynamodb --template-body file://dynamodb-cloudformation.json --region us-east-1
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:create && npm run db:wait && echo 'Tabela DynamoDB criada com sucesso!'
